about.details:
Incorporated in 1996, Eleganz Interiors Limited is engaged in the business of Interior solutions to Corporate, laboratories, airport lounge etc.

The company specializes in providing fit-out solutions for corporate and commercial spaces, including corporate offices, research and development facilities, laboratories, airport lounges, flexible workspaces, and commercial retail spaces.

The company bids for domestic tenders issued by large domestic and multinational corporations, project management consultants, and international property consultants for design and build (D&B) and general contracting (GC) services.

The company employs a team of qualified engineers, architects, designers, and project management professionals, supported by third-party consultants to ensure timely project completion, compliance, and quality standards.

Business Segment:

Design & Build services: The company offers end-to-end design and build services, including design, shop drawings, resource planning, execution, and post-project support.

General Contracting (“GC”) services: The company’s GC services include civil, mechanical, electrical work, and final refinements such as installation, finishes, inspection, and touch-ups.

The company has completed over 200 projects, totaling more than 45 lakh Sq Ft of development. As of December 31, 2024, the order book includes 47 ongoing projects across 12 cities.

As on December 30, 2024, the Company had 63 permanent employees and had engaged 380 persons on retainership basis.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced and qualified designing, engineering and execution team
  • Proven track record of diversified service offerings encompassing a wide range of industries
  • Adhering quality standards and sustainable development practices
  • Strong footprint at key economic hubs in India
  • In-house woodwork facility
  • Experienced Promoter and senior management team

faqs.question: What is the Eleganz Interiors IPO?
faqs.answer:
Eleganz Interiors IPO is a SME IPO of 6005000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹78.07 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹130 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on February 7, 2025, and closes on February 11, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Eleganz Interiors IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Eleganz Interiors IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Eleganz Interiors IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Eleganz Interiors IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Eleganz Interiors IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Eleganz Interiors IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Eleganz Interiors IPO opens on February 7, 2025 and closes on February 11, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Eleganz Interiors IPO?
faqs.answer: Eleganz Interiors IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,30,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Eleganz Interiors IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Eleganz Interiors IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Eleganz Interiors IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Eleganz Interiors IPO will be done on Wednesday, February 12, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 13, 2025. Check the Eleganz Interiors IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Eleganz Interiors IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Eleganz Interiors IPO listing date is on Friday, February 14, 2025.
